data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, New York City have been given a penalty at Yankee Stadium...
DC United have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! New York City take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Valentin Castellanos spot-kick..
Throw-in for DC United at Yankee Stadium.
New York City's Valentin Castellanos gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for DC United close to the penalty box.
DC United have been awarded a penalty in Bronx...
Julian Gressel (DC United) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to DC United.
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Bronx. Ola Kamara converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
New York City push forward at Yankee Stadium and Alexander Ring gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined DC United defence.
New York City drives forward and Ismael Tajouri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 19, Throw-in New York City.
Goal kick for DC United at Yankee Stadium.
Drew Fischer awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 23, New York City are coming forward and Alexander Ring gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
New York City have a goal kick.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 26, DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of DC United.
In the minute 29, Valentin Castellanos of New York City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for New York City in the half of DC United.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
DC United to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 34, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
Can DC United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
Drew Fischer awards DC United a goal kick.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for New York City, close to DC United's area.
Drew Fischer signals a New York City throw-in in DC United's half.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to New York City.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 44, Drew Fischer signals a DC United throw-in in New York City's half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
In the minute 45, New York City's James Sands is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
The first-half is over at Yankee Stadium.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bronx to check on James Sands, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Yankee Stadium.
Goal kick for DC United at Yankee Stadium.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of DC United.
In the minute 48, New York City to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in New York City.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In Bronx New York City drive forward through Maxime Chanot. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 52, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gary Mackay Steven (New York City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
New York City have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Ismael Tajouri gives New York City a 2-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
New York City will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from DC United.
Free kick New York City.
In the minute 59, Keaton Parks (New York City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Throw-in high up the field for New York City in Bronx.
In the minute 61, Valentin Castellanos (New York City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
New York City take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Ismael Tajouri.
In the minute 63, Anton Tinnerholm with an assist there.
New York City have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
DC United pushes forward through Griffin Yow, whose finish on goal is saved.
The away team have replaced Kevin Paredes with Yamil Asad. This is the first substitution made today by Ben Olsen.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 67, New York City drive upfield and Valentin Castellanos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a DC United defender.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New York City's Ismael Tajouri misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Drew Fischer awards DC United a goal kick.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to DC United.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 71, New York City to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
DC United make their second substitution with Joseph Mora replacing Oniel Fisher.
Ben Olsen is making the team's third substitution at Yankee Stadium with Gelmin Rivas replacing Ola Kamara.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Gudmundur Thorarinsson is replacing Gary Mackay Steven for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Keaton Parks's header is off-target for New York City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
Drew Fischer signals a DC United throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 77, DC United have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Important block from the DC United defence as Anton Tinnerholm fires in a strike for New York City.
DC United needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, Free kick for DC United in the half of New York City.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for DC United at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 81, Ben Olsen (DC United) is making a fourth substitution, with Erik Sorga replacing Griffin Yow.
Chris Odoi-Atsem is on a sub for Axel Sjoberg for DC United.
DC United's Julian Gressel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 82, New York City have a goal kick.
Valentin Castellanos for New York City has been booked by Drew Fischer and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 84, DC United's Julian Gressel is on target but unsuccessful.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 86, Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a second substitution, with Jesus Medina replacing Ismael Tajouri.
Tony Rocha is replacing Ronald Matarrita for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
Goal! Keaton Parks extends New York City lead to 4-1 with a header.
In the minute 88, Great play from Gudmundur Thorarinsson to set up the goal.
Valentin Castellanos for New York City drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
James Sands hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Bronx for New York City.
Drew Fischer awards DC United a goal kick.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match has come to a close in Bronx. The final score is 4-1.
The home team replace Keaton Parks with Nicolas Acevedo.
